name: aria button down cardigan
notes:
modern, stylish and incredibly versatile, the aria cardigan is the ultimate everyday cardigan!

featuring a wide v-neckline and button up design, this slouchy fall cardigan is cosy, comfy with customisable length! you can dress this easy crochet cardigan up with jeans and ankle boots or wear it around the house as a snuggly lounge sweater.  

the simple stitches (single crochet, single crochet 2 stitches together and half double crochet) used in the aria cardigan, gives this crochet sweater lovely drape and movement along with a knit-like look! 

this crochet pattern is also accompanied by a step-by-step video tutorial. 

sizes: xs(s, m, l, xl, 2xl, 3xl)

skill level: easy+

this pattern is written in english using us crochet terms. contains step-by-step instructions with pictures. 


check out more free crochet patterns **[here][1]**! 

sign up to my **[newsletter][2]** and never miss a new crochet pattern release!


  [1]: https://forthefrills.com
  [2]: https://view.flodesk.com/pages/5ebf67c2ab499000265d1ad4
